Reviews.Title: i expected more

Reviews.Content: i bought a zmodo 4 camera system and the quality was way better than this 8 camera system the view on this one is a bit foggy

Reviews.Content: got it an it came quick an works perfect im using it for my cell phone store its worth the money at that price im a buy one for my mom house
